description:
When he sees Yamamoto’s Box Weapon, the Phantom Knight makes the Hell Ring eat his soul to double his fighting power. Kyoko and Haru tremble with fear when they see the Phantom Knight transformed into a skeleton, but Yamamoto remains confident. The Phantom Knight loses all sense of reason and turns very vicious. Yamamoto repeatedly counters the Phantom Knight’s sword and illusion attacks with tranquility factor rain flames. Then, he brings out Shigure Soen Ryu Secret xx. Will Yamamoto be able to take revenge using the Shigure Soen Ryu he inherited from his father?
Source: crunchyroll
